sub_title: HR Manager at Global Center on Adaptation
summary: I’m a analytical, committed and sociable HR generalist that loves collectively tackling complex issues within a diverse team, working towards the same goal from different angles and viewpoints whilst learning with and from each other. I enjoy critically assessing and improving processes to make things a bit easier. Always curious and with a genuine interest in others and other fields of work, I am passionate about building bridges between people and organizational goals within an international environment.
